sense.def:
Kar je
vital
, je potrebno ali zelo pomembno.

seg.quote: It is vital to keep an accurate record of every transaction.
The way we choose to bring up children is vitally important.

sense.def:
Ljudje ali ustanove, ki so
vital
, so polni energije in življenja.

seg.quote: The Chinese were trusting, open, and vital.
We want to have a modern vital parliament.
